english.segment1: Anchors away!. This extra weight is pulling down on me. It's drowning me. And now its overboard with the necessities
english.segment2: There's no room for you to come aboard
english.segment3: Chorus: I'm setting off, setting off to sea. In a boat that's filled from bow to stern. Of things that I don't need. The smallest waves are crashing over me. Soon my muffled cries as I capsize. Will be all that's left
english.segment4: My problems always lie. In failed attempts to hide. The ways that I rely. On my dumb luck
english.segment5: Oh God, I feel my grip. Begin to slowly slip. And now this sinking ship's. As good as sunk
english.segment6: There's no room for you to come aboard. So just wait right here till I return to shore
english.segment7: Chorus: I'm setting off, setting off to sea. In a boat that's filled from bow to stern. Of things that I don't need. The smallest waves are crashing over me. Soon my muffled cries as I capsize. Will be all that's left of me
english.segment8: Anchors away!. I can't take this extra weight. It's pulling down on me. It's pulling down on me
english.segment9: Chorus: I'm setting off, setting off to sea. In a boat that's filled from bow to stern. Of things that I don't need. The smallest waves are crashing over me. Soon my muffled cries as I capsize. Will be all that's left
